dimmer_factor.description: Proportion of requests served with optional content.

basic_rt.description: The response time of requests served without optional content.

basic_throughput.description: The throughput of requests served without optional content.

opt_rt.description: The response time of requests served with optional content.

opt_throughput.description: The throughput of requests served with optional content.

arrival_rate.description: The number of requests per second received by the web application.
